action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a collection of pixelated, geometric shapes in various colors against a white background. There are several "L" shaped blocks, a plus sign, a square, and a "T" shape. The colors include shades of green, orange, purple, and pink. The shapes are scattered and don't appear to form a recognizable object.
continue

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows five Tetris-like pieces arranged on a white background. From top to bottom and left to right, the pieces are: a long, red piece shaped like an "L" and a square attached to it; an orange "T" shape; a yellow cross shape with a square below it; a purple "L" shape pointing right; and a red "T" shape. All pieces are made of squares.
